text: The 2019 Big Ten Conference Men's Soccer Tournament was the 29th edition of the tournament. It determined the Big Ten Conference's automatic berth into the 2019 NCAA Division I Men's Soccer Tournament. Maryland hosted the semifinal and final rounds of the tournament. Defending champions, Indiana, successfully defended their title, giving the program their 13th Big Ten Tournament championship. They defeated Michigan in the final in a penalty shoot-out. == Seeding == Seeding was determined by regular season conference records. {| class="wikitable" !rowspan="2"|Seed !rowspan="2"|School
